name: Blood of Steel
storyline: How will YOU claim victory in battles fought with cold hard steel? Troop organization and cunning strategies for engaging the enemy are of utmost importance. That's what is key in Blood of Steel: to gain the strategic advantage and crush the enemy beneath your fist, you must first familiarize capability of your troops with various weaponry and legion equipment, as well as utilize the terrain to its fullest.
summary: BOS is an Online Multiplayer PvP MOBA game featuring iconic heroes from world history. As a warlord, you can lead various legions and heroes, commanding them to slay your enemies in bloody battlefields. Let’s take to the rankings, seize territories or partake in strategic battles.
